alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:59AM CDT until June 14 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Northeastern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... South central Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 459 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Lake Fort Smith, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Mountainburg... Mulberry... Altus... Winslow... Denning... Chester... Wiederkehr Village... Cass... Lake Fort Smith... Fern... Jethro... Bidville... Locke... Turners Bend... Mount Gayler... Cecil... Lonelm... Etna... Alix... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 22 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 31 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
